oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial of downtown Nashville, the Cumberland River, East Nashville, Vanderbilt University, and Nashville Reservoir, 1961 January 03
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An aerial photograph of downtown Nashville, Tennessee (center) and the bridges spanning over the Cumberland River to East Nashville. The Vanderbilt University campus area near West End Avenue and 21st Avenue is pictured, as well as the Nashville Reservoir, located on a hill above 8th Avenue South (on right). Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photographic negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Vanderbilt University--History--Sources; Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.);
